sql.query:
SELECT tt_balance.id AS table_id, tt_balance.pay_ref_id, tt_balance.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.remarks, tt_balance.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_rt.user_number AS recharge_number, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.tr_mode, tt_rt.tr_type, tt_rt.tr_id, tt_rt.operator_ref, tt_rt.is_processed AS apifiredid, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.dtcommamt, tt_rt.dtchargeamt, tt_rt.mdtcommamt, tt_rt.mdtchargeamt, m_op.operator_name, m_service.service_name, m_user.created_by AS parent_id, parent_id.user_fname AS parent_fname, parent_id.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, m_user.user_fname, m_user.user_mobile, tt_balance.netamt, tt_rt.api_response_id, tt_balance.status, tt_rt.extra2 AS complain_status, tt_rt.blank3 AS ac_holder_name
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_rt.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate+' 00:00:00'}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate+' 23:59:59'}} */ AND tt_balance.user_id = :P3 /* {{identity}} */ AND m_service.service_name <> :P4 /* {{'Wallet'}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC

SELECT tt_balance.pay_ref_id AS order_id, tt_rt.tr_id AS ReqId, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.is_processed AS apifiredid, m_op.operator_name, tt_balance.status, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount AS Amount, tt_balance.netamt, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date AS DateTime, tt_rt.user_number AS Account, tt_rt.operator_ref AS remarks, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.blank3 AS ac_holder_name
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_rt.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate+' 00:00:00'}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate+' 23:59:59'}} */ AND tt_balance.user_id = :P3 /* {{identity}} */ AND m_service.service_name <> :P4 /* {{'Wallet'}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC

SELECT tt_balance.id AS table_id, tt_balance.pay_ref_id, tt_rt.is_processed AS apifiredid, tt_balance.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.remarks, tt_balance.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_rt.user_number AS recharge_number, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.tr_mode, tt_rt.tr_type, tt_rt.tr_id, tt_rt.operator_ref, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.dtcommamt, tt_rt.dtchargeamt, tt_rt.mdtcommamt, tt_rt.mdtchargeamt, m_op.operator_name, m_service.service_name, m_user.created_by AS parent_id, parent_id.user_fname AS parent_fname, parent_id.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, m_user.user_fname, m_user.user_mobile, tt_balance.netamt, tt_rt.api_response_id, tt_balance.status, tt_rt.extra2 AS complain_status, tt_rt.blank3 AS ac_holder_name
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_rt.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate+' 00:00:01'}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate+' 23:59:59'}} */ AND tt_rt.status = :P3 /* {{$_GET.selectstatus}} */ AND tt_balance.user_id = :P4 /* {{identity}} */ AND m_service.service_name <> :P5 /* {{'Wallet'}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC

SELECT tt_balance.pay_ref_id AS order_id, tt_rt.tr_id AS ReqId, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.is_processed AS apifiredid, m_op.operator_name, tt_balance.status, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount AS Amount, tt_balance.netamt, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date AS DateTime, tt_rt.user_number AS Account, tt_rt.operator_ref AS remarks, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.blank3 AS ac_holder_name
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_rt.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate+' 00:00:00'}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate+' 23:59:59'}} */ AND tt_balance.user_id = :P3 /* {{identity}} */ AND tt_rt.status = :P4 /* {{$_GET.selectstatus}} */ AND m_service.service_name <> :P5 /* {{'Wallet'}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC
